name: Ice Hell: The Asseflit Nightmare 3
description:
From the developer that brought you Office Hell: The Assetflip Nightmare and Assetflip Island, comes a new Assetflip that's even worse than before!

Welcome to...
ICE HELL: THE ASSETFLIP NIGHTMARE 3!

Can you survive 3 enemy NPCs on a fixed patrol route? Probably.

"This is the worst game I've ever made." -Me

BUY THE MERCH!!!!

Error Log:

  • F to Interact gets sticky. Try moving
    away and back a few times.
  • Sometimes the guards don't recognize
    you as an enemy. Lucky you!
